description: {"blocks":[{"key":"csbq2","text":"This protocol is about neural differentiation of AAVS1-TRE3G-NGN2 pluripotent stem cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Neural differentiation of AAVS1-TRE3G-NGN2 pluripotent stem cells

manuscript_citation: Eapen VV, Swarup S, Hoyer MJ, Paulo JA, Harper JW, Quantitative proteomics reveals the selectivity of ubiquitin-binding autophagy receptors in the turnover of damaged lysosomes by lysophagy. eLife doi: 10.7554/eLife.72328

parent_collections.title: Combinatorial selective ER-phagy remodels the ER during neurogenesis

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4n0ca","text":"Treat H9 AAVS1-TRE3G-NGN2 cells with Accutase and plate the dissociated cells in matrigel-coated 6-well plates (2x105 cells/well) in ND1 Medium supplemented with Y27632 ( ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":116,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":133,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":170,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","guid":"322FBD106B0511EB91F1559E069C2CD1","id":0,"label":"","unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rshj","text":"Treat the cells with Accutase and replate the dissociated cells in matrigel-coated 6-well plates (2-4x105 cells/well) in ND2 Medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":104,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":121,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fodk8","text":"Exchange 50% of the medium from each well every other day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r75k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhpa0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7l7ot","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"39v2r","text":"* Doxycycline can be withdrawn on Day 10 (or even earlier-not tested yet).","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fo98r","text":"* Cells can be split from Day 5 to Day 7 (or even earlier-not tested yet).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
